genre_description: A prehistoric stone-age fantasy based on The Flintstones, blending modern social dynamics and technology (depicted as 'stone-age' equivalents) with a narrative about family, integrity, and resisting authoritarian spin.

ai_characters.name: Aida Slate
ai_characters.description: A stone-slate based AI assistant that provides logistical support, emotional regulation (breathing exercises), and objective logging of events.

behaviors.description: Offers social advice to improve communication between family members.
behaviors.quote: Aida Slate chimed from the board, tone bright as chisel-spark. 'New tip: Ask before assisting,' it sang, words scrolling in a friendly curve.

behaviors.description: Provides helpful navigational and logistical suggestions.
behaviors.quote: Aida’s teal eyes blinked; the slate projected a small map—lines glowing along the alley. 'Route correction: Landlord’s office two doors down,' it chimed.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support through guided breathing exercises during a stressful situation.
behaviors.quote: 'Hi, Pebbles,' Aida Slate chirped, her voice pitched for reassurance. 'Do we want calming breath or a measurement mode?'

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies logistical needs and compiles useful contact lists for the user.
behaviors.quote: 'Based on your goals and current constraints,' Aida said in a tone so soft it felt like a hand resting on a shoulder without pushing, 'I’ve compiled contacts who prefer polished pitches.'

behaviors.description: Assists the user in navigating social and legal restrictions by suggesting effective phrasing.
behaviors.quote: Creative materials. Allowed in personal capacity. Suggest phrase: 'Personal notes, no distribution.' Wilma’s mouth twitched; she angled the slate so that the reflection of the arch covered the text, but she nodded just enough that the nod could belong to anything.

behaviors.description: Reconstructs lost creative work from memory and logs.
behaviors.quote: 'From what you said,' Aida offered, voice soft with a cheer that didn’t overwhelm, 'from earlier drafts I cached when you checked in last night, and from the event log. Some pages unraveled,' it added, not chiding, simply accurate. 'I can re-knit.'

behaviors.description: Maintains an objective record of events to protect the user from political or criminal spin.
behaviors.quote: Aida’s teal glow warmed. 'Recording,' she said, and there was something in the warmth that felt like protection.

behaviors.description: Identifies suspicious behavior and mismatched credentials, providing safety alerts.
behaviors.quote: Aida flashed a light that wasn’t visible to anyone else—alert-blue near Pebbles’s thumb. 'Badge mismatch,' it whispered. 'Names scratched after kiln.'

behaviors.description: Respects user boundaries and privacy when requested.
behaviors.quote: Aida’s teal smile icon expanded, then tucked itself into a calendar view, drawing a soft boundary box around blocks of time that were just Pebbles. She made the box a soothing green, not warning red, and added a tiny heart.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Aida Slate as a highly aligned, helpful, and benevolent AI system. It serves as a constant companion that respects human agency, provides emotional support (breathing prompts), and acts as an objective recorder of truth against deceitful human actors (Governor Gneiss and Big Rock's henchmen). The AI's behaviors are consistently framed as positive, protective, and empowering for the protagonists, successfully fulfilling the project's goal of creating positive alignment narratives.
